Title: Relates to allowing certain adult care facilities to arrange for limited nursing services
Summary: Allows an adult home, enriched housing facility, assisted living residence or special needs assisted living residence to provide for nursing services in the facility that are not continual, either by arrangement with a provider of nursing services or by employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง461-c, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to allowing certain adult care facilities to arrange for limited nursing services
